嬉しがらせ: (うれしがらせ) - flattery; adulation; commendation

嬋娟: (せんけん) - graceful; slim and beautiful

嬌羞: (きょうしゅう) - charming and coy

嬰ヘ長調: (えいヘちょうちょう) - {music} F sharp major

嬶天下: (かかあでんか) - extremely overbearing wife
子: (shi/su/ko) - child , child; young (animal); young woman, young geisha; offshoot
子々孫々: (ししそんそん) - (yoji) one's descendants; one's offspring; posterity
子ぎつね: (こぎつね) - fox cub; little fox; small fox; juvenile fox
子だくさん: (こだくさん) - many children; large family
子で子にならぬほととぎす: (こでこにならぬほととぎす) - no matter how lovingly raised, a foster child is not actually one's biological child
子で子にならぬ時鳥: (こでこにならぬほととぎす) - no matter how lovingly raised, a foster child is not actually one's biological child

子どもらしい: (こどもらしい) - childish; child-like; innocent; naive
子ども好き: (こどもずき) - being fond of children; person fond of children
子ども手当: (こどもてあて) - child benefit; child allowance
子ども手当て: (こどもてあて) - child benefit; child allowance
子なき爺: (こなきじじい) - Konaki Jijii (a ghost in Japanese folklore with the shape of a small old man and having a baby's cry)
子のう菌門: (しのうきんもん) - Ascomycota; phylum comprising the sac fungi
子の日: (ねのび) - Day of the Rat (esp. the first Day of the Rat in the New Year); collecting herbs and pulling out young pine trees by the roots; pine shoot pulled out in such a manner
子の日の松: (ねのひのまつ) - pine shoot pulled out during "ne-no-hi-no-asobi"
子の日の遊び: (ねのひのあそび) - collecting herbs and pulling out young pine trees by the roots (annual event held on the first Day of the Rat of the New Year)
子は三界の首枷: (こはさんがいのくびかせ) - A child is an everlasting responsibility to parents
子は鎹: (こはかすがい) - children are a bond between husband and wife
子を宿す: (こをやどす) - to be pregnant; to be with child
子を持って知る親の恩: (こをもってしるおやのおん) - (proverb) He that has no child knows not what love is
子を見ること親に如かず: (こをみることおやにしかず) - (proverb) The parent is the best judge of the child
子を見る事親に如かず: (こをみることおやにしかず) - (proverb) The parent is the best judge of the child
子ギャル: (コギャル) - obsessively trend-conscious teen-age girls
子マダム: (こマダム) - wealthy women who strive to follow the fashions exactly and be seen in all the right place
子作り: (こづくり) - having children; attempting to conceive
子供っぽい: (こどもっぽい) - childish; child-like; immature; infantile
子供に掛かる: (こどもにかかる) - to depend on one's children
子供に甘い: (こどもにあまい) - indulgent to (one's) children

子供の日: (こどものひ) - Children's Day (national holiday; May 5th)
子供らしい: (こどもらしい) - childish; child-like; innocent; naive
子供を妊む: (こどもをはらむ) - to conceive; to become pregnant
子供を抱く: (こどもをだく) - to hold a child in one's arms/to embrace a child; to provide for a child (children)
子供会: (こどもかい) - organization for local children (for growth via sports, study, service, etc.)
子供好き: (こどもずき) - being fond of children; person fond of children
